data.eml:eml: The genus Pseudoxyethira Schmid (Trichoptera, Hydroptilidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko (2017): The genus Pseudoxyethira Schmid (Trichoptera, Hydroptilidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 4319 (1): 194-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.1.12
